WorkItem.Description:
Rawr WPF 4.2.3 can not load/reload CN realm character from battle.net.
 
The silverlight version can not load either. But it can be input the character name, realm, class, race basic infomation manually, then use Reload Current Character From Battle.net to load.
 
While input name and realm on Load Character from Battle.net Armory window, the OK button is gray, un-clickable, that's the problem. I think you can skip realm check for TW/CN Region.
WorkItem.Summary: CN realm character can not load/reload from battle.net

Comments.Message: Can you post an example character name/server so we can test with?

Realm: 世界之树
character: Felata
